name: Flames of MiniDwellers
description:
Game Concept:

Help a young read her books for the exam, by lighting the candles her.

Our player need to deliver the flame in her area by passing the torch flame onto other creatures( known as MiniDwells in game). 

On reaching her area light all the candles.Credits:

3D environment : https://kenney.itch.io/kenney-game-assets-1

Developer : Nabarun Roy

Things I planned, but couldn't implement in time:

  • Adding variation on creature placements on each play through.
  • Adding some human beings with task of not to get detected by them.
  • Jungle area instead of ocean area.
  • Traps in places like frogs which can eat you if you get near them.
  • More platforming.
